resources.string: Hi, I am Gracia Betty Jebaraj Daniel. I am a Graduate Student studying MS in Computer Science at Pace University. I did my bachelors degree in Computer Science Engineering from KCG College of Technology in India. I was born and brought up in Chennai, India. I completed my bachelors in June 2023 and I started my masters immediately. During my bachelors I did an internship with IBM where I developed an Inventory Management App and hosted it on IBM cloud. I am passionate about Web and App development and I look forward to gain my maximum through this class.
I am passionate about music, singing and song writing. Fun Fact: I have a YouTube channel with over 100k subscribers where my albums are released. I also love to design websites.
My official email: gj87413n@pace.edu My personal email: graciadanielj@gmail.com
